title: [0 YoE, Self-Employed, Marketing & Sales, Philippines]
text:

- Student Intern  
• Working with the Merchandise Planning Division.  
• Manage Inventory Counting and Stock Accuracy for Store Branches located in NCR (Metro Manila).

Marketing & Sales
